item.description:
I know this is last minute, but I had planned on going to the Together Dance tomorrow night (Saturday) but with the pending storm, it depends on the weather, if I go.  I'm definitely heading to the benefit in Dracut earlier on Saturday. So, in light of this impending 8" of snow, I need to get the *ell out of the house, before I get snowbound again. 

If just one person will join me, I'll meet for dinner at 7pm and we can dance a whole lot with Mama Kicks by 9:30 if we're lucky.  they just don't seem to get their act together until then, but they do rock my socks off, when they do.  Great rock n' roll band.  Wish I thought of it sooner.

Please let me know in your reply if you're a definite or a maybe.

thanks and hope to "meetup" soon,

Susan

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Last minute thought...Mama Kicks at TPS scoreboard tonight
